data.eml:eml: The Notched-frons Katydids of Taiwan (Orthoptera: Tettigoniidae: Conocephalinae: Copiphorini): redescriptions and keys for identification

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sri-In, Chalida, Yang, Jeng-Tze (2019): The Notched-frons Katydids of Taiwan (Orthoptera: Tettigoniidae: Conocephalinae: Copiphorini): redescriptions and keys for identification. Zootaxa 4648 (1): 63-91, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4648.1.3
